Adds a param and bitbuffer to the big buffer.

const SharedBuffer* SFDMultiBufferWriter::createBuffer (   )  [private]
 

Creates the buffer to return in getBuffer;.

const SharedBuffer* SFDMultiBufferWriter::getBuffer (   )  const
 

Returns a buffer containing the added ones.

Maps added, and writeAdded, after first call to getBuffer will not be in the SharedBuffer even if getBuffer is called again.

uint32 SFDMultiBufferWriter::writeAdded (  bool  addDebug = false  ) 
 

Write the added maps to the buffer and return current offset.

Returns:
Offset after last byte written.
